statements: SELECT * FROM coverage_maps
SELECT area_name, signal_strength FROM coverage_maps ORDER BY coverage_id DESC
SELECT coverage_id, area_name FROM coverage_maps WHERE signal_strength > 80
SELECT MAX(signal_strength) AS max_signal_strength FROM coverage_maps
SELECT ST_AsText(coordinates) AS coordinates_text FROM coverage_maps
SELECT * FROM coverage_maps WHERE signal_strength > 50 ORDER BY area_name ASC, signal_strength DESC;
SELECT coverage_id, area_name FROM coverage_maps WHERE ST_Distance(coordinates, 'POINT(0 0)') < 1000;
SELECT coverage_id, signal_strength AS strength FROM coverage_maps WHERE area_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY signal_strength DESC;
SELECT MAX(signal_strength) AS max_strength, MIN(signal_strength) AS min_strength FROM coverage_maps;
SELECT coverage_id, area_name, signal_strength FROM coverage_maps WHERE signal_strength BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY coverage_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM coverage_maps;
SELECT area_name, coverage_type FROM coverage_maps WHERE coverage_type='4G' ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT area_name, signal_strength FROM coverage_maps WHERE signal_strength > 90;
SELECT area_name, coverage_type, signal_strength FROM coverage_maps WHERE coverage_type='5G' ORDER BY signal_strength DESC;
SELECT * FROM signal_strength_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY signal_strength DESC;
SELECT id, area_name, coverage_type, signal_strength FROM coverage_maps WHERE signal_strength > 80 ORDER BY area_name ASC
SELECT id, area_name, coverage_type, signal_strength FROM coverage_maps WHERE area_name = 'City A' OR area_name = 'City B'
SELECT id, area_name, coverage_type, AVG(signal_strength) AS avg_strength FROM coverage_maps GROUP BY area_name HAVING avg_strength > 70
SELECT id, latitude, longitude, signal_strength, timestamp FROM signal_strength_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, area_name, coverage_type, signal_strength FROM coverage_maps WHERE coverage_type LIKE '%3G%' ORDER BY signal_strength DESC
SELECT * FROM coverage_maps WHERE signal_strength > 80;
SELECT location, signal_strength FROM coverage_maps ORDER BY signal_strength DESC;
SELECT * FROM signal_strength_data WHERE frequency_band = '5G';
SELECT id, location FROM signal_strength_data WHERE strength_value < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM deployment_plans WHERE deployment_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM coverage_maps WHERE signal_strength > 50 ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, location, signal_strength FROM coverage_maps WHERE location LIKE 'New%' AND signal_strength < 70;
SELECT location, frequency_band, strength_value FROM signal_strength_data WHERE strength_value BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.8;
SELECT id, location FROM deployment_plans WHERE deployment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM deployment_plans WHERE location = 'City Center' AND equipment_required LIKE '%router%'
SELECT * FROM coverage_maps;
SELECT map_id, location, coverage_type FROM coverage_maps WHERE signal_strength > 3.5;
SELECT map_id, location, signal_strength FROM coverage_maps WHERE coverage_type = 'Outdoor';
SELECT device_id, device_name, model FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, deployment_date, location FROM deployment_plans WHERE deployment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM coverage_maps WHERE coverage_type = 'Indoor';
SELECT map_id, location FROM coverage_maps WHERE signal_strength > 3.5 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, deployment_date FROM deployment_plans WHERE location = 'New York' AND deployment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, model FROM network_devices WHERE plan_id = 3 OR plan_id = 5 ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT coverage_type, AVG(signal_strength) AS avg_strength FROM coverage_maps GROUP BY coverage_type HAVING AVG(signal_strength) > 3.0;
SELECT * FROM coverage_maps;
SELECT location, coverage_range FROM coverage_maps WHERE coverage_range > 50;
SELECT id, location, signal_strength FROM coverage_maps WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM signal_strength_data ORDER BY signal_strength DESC;
SELECT tower_id, location, capacity FROM tower_details WHERE capacity BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM coverage_maps WHERE coverage_range > 50
SELECT location, signal_strength FROM signal_strength_data WHERE signal_quality = 'Good'
SELECT location, bandwidth FROM tower_details ORDER BY bandwidth DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT location, capacity FROM tower_details WHERE location LIKE 'C%'
SELECT plan_id, number_of_towers FROM network_planning WHERE number_of_towers < 5
